sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; /** * Paste this component into your React codebase. * Usage: * */ const styles = { container: { maxWidth: 720, margin: "20px auto", padding: 24, borderRadius: 12, background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f7f9fc 100%)", boxShadow: "0 6px 18px rgba(20, 30, 60, 0.08)", fontFamily: "'Inter', 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Arial, sans-serif", color: "#102A43", lineHeight: 1.5 }, list: { margin: 0, padding: 0, listStyle: "none" }, item: { marginBottom: 12, fontSize: 16 }, highlight: { display: "block", marginTop: 18, padding: "18px 16px", borderRadius: 8, background: "#0b6cff", color: "#fff", fontWeight: 600, fontSize: 18, textAlign: "center", boxShadow: "0 8px 30px rgba(11,108,255,0.15)" }, roleLine: { marginTop: 16, fontStyle: "italic", color: "#334e68", textAlign: "center" } }; const BirthdayMessage = ({ name = "Bhumika" }) => { return (
  • A singer would pour their heart into a song, letting every note carry their wish to you.
  • A writer would craft words that dance with emotion, painting your spirit with joy.
  • A painter would splash the canvas with colors of laughter, happiness, and dreams.
  • A dancer would move with grace, each step celebrating the light you bring into the world.
  • A musician would play melodies that echo the warmth of your smile and laughter.
  • A poet would write verses that bloom like flowers, carrying the beauty of your soul.
  • A photographer would capture moments where your happiness shines brighter than the sun.

And as a Software Engineer weaving code into joy, painting the web with care and creativity, I thought I would wish this way â€”

Happy Birthday {name}! May your life overflow with happiness, laughter, and magical moments that stay in your heart forever.
); }; export default BirthdayMessage;
